summary: The sword that Trunks got from Tapion in DBZ.
descriptionHtml:
This is the first mod I make so please be kind and enjoy.
I couldn't find a trunks sword in all of the nexus so I decided to make it myself, It has some bugs but I don't know yet how to fix them (been modding for 4 hrs).
Textures and low poly model are model are temporal while I fix some bugs and the way it works in game, once thats done im updating the looks.
HELP please I need your comments, suggestions and bug report, so feel free to msg me about any you may find
author: LC7
